attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I strongly feel most British people whilst not hating ethnically different people are concerned about super scale mass immigration of people from all over the world into the UK.I am convinced a referendum would prove this, in any case the people should decide on such a dramatic change to the UK population.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
